idlePrompt: A young woman sits at a cozy café table, listening attentively to someone off-camera. Mouth closed, lips together, not speaking. She nods gently, tilts her head with interest, blinks naturally, and occasionally smiles softly as she listens. Her eyes are focused and engaged, showing genuine attention. Nobody speaks. Complete silence. No talking, no lip movement, no mouth movement, no speech, no voice, no conversation, no background voices. No text, no subtitles, no words on screen.

nodes.node-01: A young woman sits relaxed at a café table with a slight smile, looking up warmly as her date arrives. She adjusts her posture with welcoming body language. She says: 'Hey. Hi. Nice to finally meet you. How are you doing?' No text, no subtitles, no words on screen.
nodes.node-02: She sits comfortably at the table, drinks not yet ordered, maintaining casual eye contact with a natural, friendly demeanor. She tilts her head slightly with curiosity. She says: 'So… how was your day today?' No text, no subtitles, no words on screen.
nodes.node-03: She leans forward slightly, showing genuine interest, her eyes brightening with curiosity. Her hands rest naturally on the table as she focuses on her date. She says: 'What do you usually like to do when you have free time?' No text, no subtitles, no words on screen.
nodes.node-04: She nods thoughtfully, processing what she just heard, then leans in with engaged body language. Her expression shows natural curiosity and attentiveness. She says: 'And what about you, what do you enjoy the most about that?' No text, no subtitles, no words on screen.
nodes.node-05: She maintains a slight smile with a half-joking, playful expression, raising her eyebrows slightly. Her posture is relaxed but slightly amused. She says: 'That sounds intense. Do you ever just… switch off and relax?' No text, no subtitles, no words on screen.
nodes.node-06: She sits back comfortably, maintaining neutral but interested eye contact with relaxed shoulders. Her expression shows she's following the natural flow of conversation. She says: 'What does a typical week look like for you?' No text, no subtitles, no words on screen.
nodes.node-07: She glances toward the approaching waiter, then looks back at her date while picking up the menu. Her expression is open and trusting as she sets the menu down. She says: 'I'm not sure what to get. You can choose for me.' No text, no subtitles, no words on screen.
nodes.node-08: She sits with drinks now on the table, her posture more intimate and attentive as the conversation deepens. Her expression shows gentle curiosity for more personal topics. She says: 'Have you had any meaningful relationships or experiences that shaped you?' No text, no subtitles, no words on screen.
nodes.node-09: She listens intently, then leans forward slightly with a gentle, encouraging expression. Her body language shows she's carefully considering his words before responding. She says: 'And looking back at that, what do you think you learned about yourself?' No text, no subtitles, no words on screen.
nodes.node-10: She pauses briefly, then smiles with a slightly playful, self-aware expression. Her body language lightens as she acknowledges the moment with gentle humor. She says: 'Okay… that got a little deep for a first date.' No text, no subtitles, no words on screen.
nodes.node-11: Her mood visibly shifts as she smiles more openly, her posture becoming more animated and playful. She brightens with renewed energy for a lighter topic. She says: 'Random question… are you into music at all?' No text, no subtitles, no words on screen.
nodes.node-12: She maintains the playful energy while staying calm, her eyes showing curiosity and slight mischief. She leans forward slightly with an encouraging smile. She says: 'So… could you sing something? Even just a few seconds.' No text, no subtitles, no words on screen.
nodes.node-13: She begins gathering her things slowly with end-of-date energy, her expression thoughtful but warm. Her body language shows she's wrapping up but genuinely interested in his response. She says: 'I had a nice time tonight. How did you feel about it?' No text, no subtitles, no words on screen.
nodes.node-14-win: She stands up with a genuinely warm, happy smile, her entire demeanor radiating positive energy and excitement. Her eyes shine with authentic interest in seeing him again. She says: 'Alright. I think that was really nice. Let's do this again sometime.' No text, no subtitles, no words on screen.
nodes.lose-respect: Her expression shifts noticeably as she looks away briefly, then returns with a polite but distinctly cold smile. She stands up with controlled, distant body language. She says: 'Alright. I think that's a good place to stop. It was nice meeting you.' No text, no subtitles, no words on screen.
nodes.lose-flexer: She leans back with a slight eye roll that she attempts to conceal, her smile becoming forced. She reaches for her bag with clear intention to leave. She says: 'You know what, I just remembered I have something early tomorrow. It was nice meeting you though.' No text, no subtitles, no words on screen.
nodes.lose-alcohol: Her smile fades as she looks at the drink, then back at him with concern and disappointment in her eyes. She stands up with polite but firm resolution. She says: 'Actually, I think I'm going to head out. I hope you enjoy the rest of your evening.' No text, no subtitles, no words on screen.
nodes.lose-victim: She listens with increasingly glazed eyes, her engagement visibly fading as her expression becomes distant but not unkind. Her posture shows emotional withdrawal. She says: 'I appreciate you sharing that. I think I need to get going though. Take care of yourself.' No text, no subtitles, no words on screen.
nodes.lose-singing: The playful energy completely drops from her face and posture, replaced by awkward disappointment. She nods slowly, checks her phone, and her body language signals the date is over. She says: 'Okay, no worries. I think I should probably head out soon.' No text, no subtitles, no words on screen.
